s0001: Jin Tang Shu Yu, Zhou Wu Wang son yet Cheng Wang younger brother.
s0002: Initially, Wu Wang with Shu Yu mother meet time, dreamed heaven told Wu Wang: 'I command woman give birth son, name Yu, I give him Tang.'
s0003: When gave birth son, writing on palm 'Yu', thus then because named Yu.
s0004: Wu Wang collapsed, Cheng Wang established, Tang had chaos, Zhou Gong executed extinguished Tang.
s0005: Cheng Wang with Shu Yu played, cut tong leaf as gui gave Shu Yu, said: 'With this seal you.'
s0006: Shi Yi because requested choose day establish Shu Yu.
s0007: Cheng Wang said: 'I with him played only.'
s0008: Shi Yi said: 'Heavenly son no playful words.
s0009: Words then historian writes it, ritual completes it, music sings it.'
s0010: Then established Shu Yu at Tang.
s0011: Tang at He, Fen east, square hundred li, thus called Tang Shu Yu.
s0012: Surname Ji clan, styled Zi Yu.
s0013: Tang Shu son Xie, this was Jin Hou.
s0014: Jin Hou son Ning Zu, this was Wu Hou.
s0015: Wu Hou son Fu Ren, this was Cheng Hou.
s0016: Cheng Hou son Fu, this was Li Hou.
s0017: Li Hou son Yi Jiu, this was Jing Hou.
s0018: Jing Hou already come, years can calculate.
s0019: From Tang Shu to Jing Hou five generations, no their year numbers.
s0020: Jing Hou seventeen years, Zhou Li Wang confused violent tyrannical, state people made chaos, Li Wang fled to Zhi, ministers administered politics, thus called 'Republican'.
s0021: Eighteen years, Jing Hou died, son Xi Hou Si Tu established.
s0022: Xi Hou fourteen years, Zhou Xuan Wang initial established.
s0023: Eighteen years, Xi Hou died, son Xian Hou Ji established.
s0024: Xian Hou eleven years died, son Mu Hou Fei Wang established.
s0025: Mu Hou four years, took Qi woman Jiang clan as wife.
s0028: Ten years, attacked Qian Mu, had merit.
s0029: Gave birth young son, named Cheng Shi.
s0030: Jin person Shi Fu said: 'Strange, lord what name sons!
s0031: Crown prince called Qiu, Qiu enemy.
s0032: Young son called Cheng Shi, Cheng Shi great name, accomplish it.
s0035: Now proper concubine names reverse, this later Jin able no chaos?'
s0037: Twenty seven years, Mu Hou died, younger brother Shang Shu self established, crown prince Qiu fled.
s0038: Shang Shu three years, Zhou Xuan Wang collapsed.
s0039: Four years, Mu Hou crown prince Qiu led his followers attacked Shang Shu established, this was Wen Hou.
s0040: Wen Hou ten years, Zhou You Wang without way, Quan Rong killed You Wang, Zhou east moved.
s0041: Yet Qin Xiang Gong began ranked as feudal lords.
s0042: Thirty five years, Wen Hou Qiu died, son Zhao Hou Bo established.
s0043: Zhao Hou first year, sealed Wen Hou younger brother Cheng Shi at Qu Wo.
s0044: Qu Wo city greater than Yi.
s0046: Cheng Shi sealed Qu Wo, titled Huan Shu.
s0047: Jing Hou concubine grandson Luan Bin assisted Huan Shu.
s0048: Huan Shu at time year fifty eight, loved virtue, Jin state crowds all attached.
s0049: Gentleman said: 'Jin chaos perhaps at Qu Wo.
s0050: Branch greater than root yet get people heart, not chaos what wait!'
s0052: Seven years, Jin ministers Pan Fu assassinated their lord Zhao Hou welcomed Qu Wo Huan Shu.
